import logo from './logo.svg'; import React from "react" import './App.css'; import axios from "axios" class App extends React.Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state={ username:"", firstname:"", lastname:"", email:"", password:"", error:"" } } handleChange=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); this.setState({ [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } submit1=(e)=>{ console.log(new Date(),new Date().getTime()); } submit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); axios.post("http://localhost:3002/auth/signup",this.state).then((response)=>{ if(!response.data._id){ this.setState({ error:"User already exist" }) }else{ const obj={ data:response.data, } localStorage.setItem("id",obj) this.setState({ error:"" }) } }) } render(){ return (
